testcase.name: Verify user is successsfully navigated to Green kart Landing page
testcase.system-out: Given user navigated to the Greenkart site "https://rahulshettyacademy.com/seleniumPractise/#/".passed Then user is able to validate the Logo......................................passed

testcase.name: Verify the user is able to search the brinjal
testcase.system-out: Given user navigated to the Greenkart site "https://rahulshettyacademy.com/seleniumPractise/#/".passed When user entered the text "brinjal" in search box..........................passed Then user is able to see the search result..................................passed

testcase.name: verify the user is able to add the vegetable to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigated to the Greenkart site "https://rahulshettyacademy.com/seleniumPractise/#/".passed When user entered the text "brinjal" in search box..........................passed Then user is able to see the search result..................................passed When user clicks on Add to cart.............................................passed And clicks on cart icon.....................................................passed Then the user is able to see the added item in the cart.....................passed

testcase.name: verify the user is able to see the facebook logo in landing page
testcase.system-out: Given user navigated to the facebook login page "https://www.facebook.com/".passed Then user is able to see the facebook logo..................................passed

testcase.name: Verify the user is able to enter different users cred's in fb login fields
testcase.system-out: Given user navigated to the facebook login page "https://www.facebook.com/".passed When user entered the usernameuser1 and password123.........................passed And clicked on Login........................................................passed Then user is able to login to fb account....................................passed
